TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class ClientBuildManager : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ClientBuildManager extends System.MarshalByRefObject implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class ClientBuildManager Inherits MarshalByRefObject Implements IDisposable
public ref class ClientBuildManager sealed : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable

summary.span: 提供 ASP.NET 應用程式的編譯 (Compilation) 服務。

span.span: Provides compilation services for ASP.NET applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供方法和屬性的編譯 ASP.NET Web 應用程式，並擷取產生的組件，或產生的原始程式碼。The class offers methods and properties for compiling ASP.NET Web applications, and retrieving the generated assemblies or generated source code. 類別的執行個體的用戶端應用程式定義域中建立，並提供存取 ASP.NET 建置系統之外 Microsoft 網際網路資訊服務 (IIS)。Instances of the class are established in the client's application domain and provide access to the ASP.NET build system outside of Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS). 類別可以用來開發自訂的工具編譯 Web 應用程式。The class can be used to develop customized tools for compiling Web applications. 命令列工具`aspnet_compiler`使用類別。The command-line tool `aspnet_compiler` uses the class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 編譯與應用程式相關的檔案，例如 App_Code 目錄中的檔案、Global.asax 檔案、資源檔案，以及 Web 參考。

span.span: Compiles application-dependent files, such as files in the App_Code directory, the Global.asax file, resource files, and Web references.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可確保編譯資源、 Web 參考、 App_Code 目錄中的檔案、.browser App_Browsers 目錄中的檔案和 Global.asax 檔案。The method ensures that resources, Web references, files in the App_Code directory, .browser files in the App_Browsers directory, and the Global.asax file are compiled.

summary.span: 傳回由虛擬路徑表示的檔案之 codeDOM 樹狀、編譯器型別和編譯器參數。

span.span: Returns the codeDOM tree, compiler type, and compiler parameters for a file represented by a virtual path.
A for the given file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會擷取編譯檔案所需的資訊。The method retrieves information needed to compile a file. 除了物件做為傳回值，它會傳回三個`out`參數。In addition to a object as a return value, it returns three `out` parameters. `codeDomProviderType`參數會傳回提供者型別產生和編譯檔案。The `codeDomProviderType` parameter returns the provider type for generating and compiling the file. `compilerParameters`參數包含決定編譯行為的屬性。The `compilerParameters` parameter contains properties that determine compilation behavior. `linePragmasTable`參數包含行程式的字典。The `linePragmasTable` parameter contains a dictionary of line pragmas.

MemberSignature.Value: public string[] GetAppDomainShutdownDirectories ();
.method public hidebysig instance string[] GetAppDomainShutdownDirectories() cil managed
Public Function GetAppDomainShutdownDirectories () As String()
public: cli::array <System::String ^> ^ GetAppDomainShutdownDirectories();

summary.span: 取得目錄，其中含有當變更時會導致應用程式定義域關閉的檔案。

span.span: Gets the directories with files that, when changed, cause the application domain to shut down.

returns.span: 陣列，包含最上層目錄名稱。

span.span: A array containing the top-level directory names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 特定的最上層目錄中檔案的變更會導致應用程式定義域關閉。Changes to files in specific top-level directories cause the application domain to shut down. 分類收納、 App_Code、 Global_Resources、 Web 參考和 App_Browsers 目錄中的檔案會監視偵測到任何變更。Files within the Bin, App_Code, Global_Resources, Web References, and App_Browsers directories are monitored to detect any changes. 偵測到變更時，應用程式定義域已關閉。When changes are detected, the application domain is shut down.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.IDictionary GetBrowserDefinitions ();
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.IDictionary GetBrowserDefinitions() cil managed
Public Function GetBrowserDefinitions () As IDictionary
public: System::Collections::IDictionary ^ GetBrowserDefinitions();

summary.span: 取得瀏覽器項目的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of browser elements.
An containing browser elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件包含索引鍵的瀏覽器名稱和物件的值。The object contains browser names for the keys and objects for the values. 物件每一個都包含父瀏覽器項目、 描述以及瀏覽器中的項目樹狀結構的深度的名稱。The objects each contain the name of the parent browser element, a description, and the depth of the browser element in the tree.

summary.span: 取得編譯器型別、編譯器參數，以及儲存從非程式碼檔案 (例如 .wsdl 檔案) 產生的程式碼檔案之目錄等相關資訊。

span.span: Gets information about the compiler type, compiler parameters, and the directory in which to store code files generated from non-code files such as .wsdl files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會擷取建置程式碼目錄所需的資訊。The method retrieves information needed to build a code directory. 它會傳回這項資訊到第三`out`參數。It returns this information through three `out` parameters. `codeDomProviderType`參數會傳回提供者型別產生和編譯程式碼目錄中的檔案。The `codeDomProviderType` parameter returns the provider type for generating and compiling the files in the code directory. `compilerParameters`參數包含決定編譯行為的屬性。The `compilerParameters` parameter contains properties that determine compilation behavior. `generatedFilesDir`參數將儲存包含產生的程式碼目錄，例如.wsdl 檔案中的非程式碼檔案中的程式碼檔的目錄路徑。The `generatedFilesDir` parameter stores the directory path containing all the code files generated from non-code files in the code directory, such as .wsdl files.

span.span: is null.

summary.span: 藉由防止建立使用期 (Lease)，為應用程式定義域提供無限的存留期 (Lifetime)。

span.span: Gives the application domain an infinite lifetime by preventing a lease from being created.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫其基底類別中的方法。This method overrides the method in its base class. 它會一律傳回`null`，因而會防止建立會限制應用程式定義域的存留期的使用期。It always returns `null` and thereby prevents a lease from being created that would limit the application domain's lifetime.

span.span: if the application domain for compiling ASP.NET Web applications has been created; otherwise, .

summary.span: 先行編譯 ASP.NET 應用程式。

span.span: Precompiles an ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支援三種形式的先行編譯。ASP.NET supports three forms of precompilation. 一種格式可讓您就地先行編譯的 ASP.NET 應用程式。One form allows for the in-place precompilation of an ASP.NET application. 在這種形式，站台是部署到生產環境，然後預先編譯，這就不需要將站台時，使用者第一次造訪動態編譯。In this form, the site is deployed to production and then precompiled, which eliminates the need to dynamically compile the site when it is first visited by a user. 第一個站台的使用者不會發生動態編譯的站台上正常情況下遇到延遲。The first user of the site will not experience the delay normally encountered on a site that is dynamically compiled. 部署會使用兩個其他形式的先行編譯。The two other forms of precompilation are used for deployment. 在任一形式中，產生的站台配置，可以部署至實際執行電腦。In either form, a layout of the site is generated that can be deployed to a production computer. 其中一個表單包含標記頁，所以無法編譯站台上執行某些數量的更新。One of these forms includes the markup pages so some amount of updating can be performed on the compiled site. 另一個表單不包含標記頁，因此無法更新不需要重新編譯原始站台。The other form does not contain the markup pages and therefore cannot be updated without recompiling the original site. 沒有來源的程式碼會部署到目標環境，其中一種形式的先行編譯。No source code is deployed to the target environment in either of these forms of precompilation. 先行編譯應用程式透過定義建構函式。The application to precompile is defined through the constructor. 物件建構函式會定義哪些執行先行編譯的三種形式。The object of the constructor defines which of the three forms of precompilation to perform. 開發人員可以先行編譯網站`aspnet_compiler`命令列工具，或呼叫方法。A developer can precompile a Web site with the `aspnet_compiler` command-line tool or by calling the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public void PrecompileApplication ();
.method public hidebysig instance void PrecompileApplication() cil managed
Public Sub PrecompileApplication ()
public: void PrecompileApplication();

summary.span: 先行編譯 ASP.NET 應用程式。

span.span: Precompiles an ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支援三種形式的先行編譯。ASP.NET supports three forms of precompilation. 一種格式可讓您就地先行編譯的 ASP.NET 應用程式。One form allows for the in-place precompilation of an ASP.NET application. 在這種形式，站台是部署到生產環境，然後預先編譯，這就不需要將站台時，使用者第一次造訪動態編譯。In this form, the site is deployed to production and then precompiled, which eliminates the need to dynamically compile the site when it is first visited by a user. 第一個站台的使用者不會發生動態編譯的站台上正常情況下遇到延遲。The first user of the site will not experience the delay normally encountered on a site that is dynamically compiled. 部署會使用兩個其他形式的先行編譯。The two other forms of precompilation are used for deployment. 在任一形式中，產生的站台配置，可以部署至實際執行電腦。In either form, a layout of the site is generated that can be deployed to a production computer. 其中一個表單包含標記頁，所以無法編譯站台上執行某些數量的更新。One of these forms includes the markup pages so some amount of updating can be performed on the compiled site. 另一個表單不包含標記頁，因此無法更新不需要重新編譯原始站台。The other form does not contain the markup pages and therefore cannot be updated without recompiling the original site. 沒有來源的程式碼會部署到目標環境，其中一種形式的先行編譯。No source code is deployed to the target environment in either of these forms of precompilation. 先行編譯應用程式透過定義建構函式。The application to precompile is defined through the constructor. 物件建構函式會定義哪些執行先行編譯的三種形式。The object of the constructor defines which of the three forms of precompilation to perform. 開發人員可以先行編譯網站`aspnet_compiler`命令列工具，或呼叫方法。A developer can precompile a Web site with the `aspnet_compiler` command-line tool or by calling the method.

.method public hidebysig instance void PrecompileApplication(class System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback callback) cil managed
Public Sub PrecompileApplication (callback As ClientBuildManagerCallback)
public: void PrecompileApplication(System::Web::Compilation::ClientBuildManagerCallback ^ callback);

param.name: callback
param.span: ，包含報告編譯結果時要呼叫的方法。

span.span: A containing the method to call when reporting the result of compilation.

summary.span: 先行編譯 ASP.NET 應用程式，並提供回呼方法以接收關於組建的狀態資訊。

span.span: Precompiles an ASP.NET application and provides a callback method to receive status information about the build.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支援三種形式的先行編譯。ASP.NET supports three forms of precompilation. 一種格式可讓您就地先行編譯的 ASP.NET 應用程式。One form allows for the in-place precompilation of an ASP.NET application. 在這種形式，站台是部署到生產環境，然後預先編譯，這就不需要將站台時，使用者第一次造訪動態編譯。In this form, the site is deployed to production and then precompiled, which eliminates the need to dynamically compile the site when it is first visited by a user. 第一個站台的使用者不會發生動態編譯的站台上正常情況下遇到延遲。The first user of the site will not experience the delay normally encountered on a site that is dynamically compiled. `callback`參數包含要報告的編譯結果時所呼叫的方法。The `callback` parameter contains the method to call when reporting the result of compilation. 部署會使用兩個其他形式的先行編譯。The two other forms of precompilation are used for deployment. 在任一形式中，產生的站台配置，可以部署至實際執行電腦。In either form, a layout of the site is generated that can be deployed to a production computer. 其中一個表單包含標記頁，所以無法編譯站台上執行某些數量的更新。One of these forms includes the markup pages so some amount of updating can be performed on the compiled site. 另一個表單不包含標記頁，因此無法更新不需要重新編譯原始站台。The other form does not contain the markup pages and therefore cannot be updated without recompiling the original site. 沒有來源的程式碼會部署到目標環境，其中一種形式的先行編譯。No source code is deployed to the target environment in either of these forms of precompilation. 先行編譯應用程式透過定義建構函式。The application to precompile is defined through the constructor. 物件建構函式會定義哪些執行先行編譯的三種形式。The object of the constructor defines which of the three forms of precompilation to perform. 開發人員可以先行編譯網站`aspnet_compiler`命令列工具，或呼叫方法。A developer can precompile a Web site with the `aspnet_compiler` command-line tool or by calling the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public void PrecompileApplication (System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback callback, bool forceCleanBuild);
.method public hidebysig instance void PrecompileApplication(class System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback callback, bool forceCleanBuild) cil managed
Public Sub PrecompileApplication (callback As ClientBuildManagerCallback, forceCleanBuild As Boolean)
public: void PrecompileApplication(System::Web::Compilation::ClientBuildManagerCallback ^ callback, bool forceCleanBuild);

param.name: callback
param.span: ，包含報告編譯結果時要呼叫的方法。

span.span: A containing the method to call when reporting the result of compilation.

param.name: forceCleanBuild
param.span: 表示執行清除建置，這會首先刪除所有物件和中繼檔案， 則表示僅重建已變更的檔案。

span.span: to perform a clean build, which will first delete all object and intermediate files; to rebuild only those files that have changed.

param.span: 如果建置環境可能不取得相依性，則設為 true。

span.span: Set to true if there is a chance that a dependency might not be picked up by the build environment.

summary.span: 先行編譯 ASP.NET 應用程式，提供回呼方法以接收組建相關的狀態資訊，並指出是否建立全新的組建。

span.span: Precompiles an ASP.NET application, provides a callback method to receive status information about the build, and indicates whether to create a clean build.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支援三種形式的先行編譯。ASP.NET supports three forms of precompilation. 一種格式可讓您就地先行編譯的 ASP.NET 應用程式。One form allows for the in-place precompilation of an ASP.NET application. 在這種形式，站台是部署到生產環境，然後預先編譯，這就不需要將站台時，使用者第一次造訪動態編譯。In this form, the site is deployed to production and then precompiled, which eliminates the need to dynamically compile the site when it is first visited by a user. 第一個站台的使用者不會發生動態編譯的站台上正常情況下遇到延遲。The first user of the site will not experience the delay normally encountered on a site that is dynamically compiled. `callback`參數包含要報告的編譯結果時所呼叫的方法。The `callback` parameter contains the method to call when reporting the result of compilation. 部署會使用兩個其他形式的先行編譯。The two other forms of precompilation are used for deployment. 在任一形式中，產生的站台配置，可以部署至實際執行電腦。In either form, a layout of the site is generated that can be deployed to a production computer. 其中一個表單包含標記頁，所以無法編譯站台上執行某些數量的更新。One of these forms includes the markup pages so some amount of updating can be performed on the compiled site. 另一個表單不包含標記頁，因此無法更新不需要重新編譯原始站台。The other form does not contain the markup pages and therefore cannot be updated without recompiling the original site. 沒有來源的程式碼會部署到目標環境，其中一種形式的先行編譯。No source code is deployed to the target environment in either of these forms of precompilation. 先行編譯應用程式透過定義建構函式。The application to precompile is defined through the constructor. 物件建構函式會定義哪些執行先行編譯的三種形式。The object of the constructor defines which of the three forms of precompilation to perform. 開發人員可以先行編譯網站`aspnet_compiler`命令列工具，或呼叫方法。A developer can precompile a Web site with the `aspnet_compiler` command-line tool or by calling the method.
